description: jug and cover, Mary I, the jug of Wrotham ware with looped handle; the mounts of silver engraved with scrolling leaf designs and the cover repousse with lobes centering on cornelian
text: This utilitarian jug is ornamented with well-engraved silver mounts, and is surmounted by a cast cherub's-head thumbpiece and a cornelian (red chalcedony).
title: Covered jug
